descriptionHTML:
Notice regarding discontinuation of TV Programs and Video on Demand

Thank you very much for your loyal support in using Video & TV SideView.
TV Programs and Video on Demand functionality offered on Video & TV SideView have been concluded as of May 30th, 2017.

Functions that will no longer be offered:
- Program guide
- Top picks（excluding My Library）
- Timer REC
- Reminder
- Bookmark
- SerialAbTak, YouTube, PlayStation Video, Crackle, watchmi, UseeTV, PPTV, Zattoo

Please note that the following functions will remain available:
Remote control, Home network, My Library, Mobile device

*Some functions and services may not be supported in certain regions/countries
-----

Sony's TV remote control app Video＆TV SideView will make your TV viewing experience more enjoyable.

Using a smartphone or tablet, you can use the app as a TV remote control for the home. 

Key features
1. Turn your smartphone and tablet into a quick remote controller.
2. The My library tab under Top picks lists video contents stored on your mobile device and plays them in a video player on the mobile device.
  
App speed and performance has also been improved making this is more effective Sony TV remote to date.
 
This app is compatible with Xperia™ devices, Samsung GALAXY devices, Google Nexus devices, and Android devices by all manufacturers, but some features may be limited depending on the model and version.
*Nexus9 is not supported

2. Some functions and services may not be supported by certain home devices.
3. Some functions and services may not be supported in certain regions/countries.
comments: Is this for watching videos or for using as a remote? Because trying to do both is just weird. Since this former video player started doing two things badly instead of one thing well, I can no longer delete videos, and the rotate button only rotates clockwise, or back again. Just plain stupid.
Please, please, please make the remote a default opening setting! Most annoying thing on this app is it opens to My Library yet that function doesn't work! I just want the remote!

It's a great app, but it does have occasional annoying glitches where by nothing will play whatsoever. I've been trying all day to sort but cannot yet. It has happened before so hopefully will sort itself out. Other that that it's great and very useful for casting onto any home tv

We just need a good remote and to control our TV and watch movies, shows in it. Please stop recommending videos in this app. Just remove that section, it's really annoying and really making the app slow when opening and connecting to TV
Why is this app necessary to use the video application? Bollocks.
Useless. Absolutely no point in this app what so ever since they removed all the features and functionalities. XZ Premium 8.0
